bridge-type.label: Grünbeck Cloud Bridge
bridge-type.description: Bridge representing the Grünbeck Cloud Account

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: User Name
parameter.description: This is the user name required to log in to Grünbeck Cloud

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: This is the password required to log in to Grünbeck Cloud.

parameter.name: refreshPeriod
parameter.label: Connect Refresh Period (seconds)
parameter.description: This is the frequency of the polling requests to the Grünbeck Cloud API. There are limits to the number of requests that can be sent to the API. The more often you poll, the better status updates - at the risk of running out of your request quota.
